brand_identity.name: OnTheGo Travels
brand_identity.target_audience: Budget-conscious travelers seeking honest deals in North-East India & Himalayas

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, destination names

hero_section.instruction: Left side: High-impact serif typography with 'Adventure Gold' CTA. Right side: A collage or single high-quality image of the Himalayas with soft edges.

destinations_grid.instruction: Use a non-uniform grid. Some cards span 2 columns. Use 'group' hover effects to zoom images slightly. Text overlay should be on a gradient at the bottom of the card.

pricing_transparency.instruction: Design the pricing breakdown to look like a clean, modern receipt or invoice. Show exactly where the money goes (Hotels, Transport, Agency Fee). Use a dashed line separator.
pricing_transparency.classes: bg-white p-8 rounded-2xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm max-w-md mx-auto

how_it_works.instruction: A clean vertical line with numbered nodes. Each node expands on hover to show details. Use icons for 'Enquire', 'Customize', 'Book', 'Travel'.

navbar.classes: fixed top-4 left-4 right-4 md:left-1/2 md:-translate-x-1/2 md:w-auto md:max-w-4xl bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 rounded-full px-6 py-3 shadow-lg z-50 flex items-center justify-between

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all

cards.destination: relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl aspect-[4/5] group cursor-pointer
cards.trust_signal: bg-slate-50 p-6 rounded-2xl flex flex-col items-center text-center gap-4 hover:bg-white hover:shadow-md transition-all

forms.enquiry: Embed the Google Form in a clean iframe wrapper with rounded corners and a loading skeleton. Do not style the form itself, but style the container.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic gradients. Use solid colors or very subtle mesh gradients.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA standards).
Use 'Manrope' for all body text and 'Playfair Display' for headings.
Mobile-first: Ensure all grids collapse to 1 column on mobile.
Images must have 'alt' tags for accessibility.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-trust, transparent travel agency site. Focus on the 'Pricing Transparency' and 'How it Works' sections as they are unique selling points. Use the provided image URLs for the destination cards. Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the destinations page. Ensure the Google Form is embedded correctly in the Contact section.
